entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 5:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 34 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
